abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is investigating 14 reports of sexual transmission of Zika virus, including to pregnant women; cases, if confirmed, would have major implications for controlling virus thought to be mainly spread by mosquito bites.
lead_paragraph: The agency said it was investigating new cases of transmission from male travelers to female partners and had confirmed two of them.

headline.main: C.D.C. Investigating 14 New Reports of Zika Transmission Through Sex
headline.print_headline: 14 New Reports of Sexual Transmission of Zika in U.S.

snippet: The agency said it was investigating new cases of transmission from male travelers to female partners and had confirmed two of them.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
